subject: Zenyatta (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
lead_paragraph: The 4-year-old Haynesfield covered the 1.25-miles in 2:02.48 in the final prep before the Breeders’ Cup next month at Churchill Downs.
snippet: The 4-year-old Haynesfield covered the 1.25-miles in 2:02.48 in the final prep before the Breeders’ Cup next month at Churchill Downs.
